name: Champions Rise
description:
In an unknown world and without knowledge of magic suffered from the fall of something unknown from the heavens, the fall of this object in a mountain range caused the mountains themselves to invert and ascend to the skies giving rise to the Archipelago of the Ascension, since then, several warriors and adventurers from all over the world in search of this object with such power climb these floating islands facing each other in deadly battles. Champions Rise will be a PC game with floating arena battles, in which the winner will be the last player to stay on the island without being pushed off it.

If you can rate the game, it will help me a lot.

Thanks for playing my game.
